laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Toxigenic C. difficile by Illumigene DNA amplification assay
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. (Reference Range-Negative).

Several new ground-glass opacities in the right lower lobe consistent with developing infectious process; 1 cm segment VII hypodense lesion consistent with a hemangioma; no pleural effusion; no solid masses or hydronephrosis.
